hero.title: AI Trading Strategies
hero.subtitle: Choose the perfect trading plan that matches your risk tolerance

plans.title: Conservative AI Trading Plan
plans.subtitle: Capital Preservation with Moderate Returns
plans.description: This plan uses low-risk strategies focusing on high-probability setups, aiming for stable returns with minimal drawdown. Typical strategies include trend-following in stable markets and fixed-income investments like bond-based CFDs or low-volatility Forex pairs.
plans.recommended: Risk-averse customers who prioritize capital preservation over aggressive growth.

strategies.title: Mean Reversion
strategies.description: Captures small profits in price deviations from historical averages, focusing on assets with low volatility.

strategies.title: Arbitrage
strategies.description: Utilizes minor price discrepancies between Forex and CFD pairs to earn small, consistent profits.

strategies.title: Sentiment Analysis
strategies.description: Analyzes market sentiment in stable assets to anticipate minor price adjustments.

plans.title: Moderate AI Trading Plan
plans.subtitle: Balanced Growth and Income
plans.description: This plan targets customers seeking moderate income with balanced risk. The AI employs trend-following, sentiment analysis, and selective high-frequency trading strategies across diversified assets like Forex, major crypto, and commodities CFDs.
plans.recommended: Customers with a moderate risk tolerance looking for a balance between growth and income.

strategies.title: Trend Following
strategies.description: Captures profit from established trends in Forex pairs and major cryptos.

strategies.title: Sentiment Analysis in Crypto and Forex Markets
strategies.description: Identifies shifts in investor sentiment to adjust positions for higher probability trades.

strategies.title: Selective High-Frequency Trading (HFT)
strategies.description: Executes short-term trades in high-liquidity pairs to capture small profits from quick movements.

plans.title: Aggressive AI Trading Plan
plans.subtitle: High-Risk, High-Return Strategy
plans.description: This plan is designed for high-risk-tolerant customers aiming for high returns. The AI uses high-frequency trading (HFT) and leveraged CFD strategies to maximize potential profit from rapid market movements, especially in crypto and volatile Forex pairs.
plans.recommended: Customers with a high risk tolerance who are comfortable with potential large drawdowns for the possibility of higher returns.

strategies.title: High-Frequency Trading (HFT)
strategies.description: Executes numerous trades in volatile pairs to capitalize on rapid price fluctuations.

strategies.title: Leveraged Trend Following
strategies.description: Uses leverage on trending Forex and crypto pairs to maximize gains from significant movements.

strategies.title: Sentiment and News-Driven Trading
strategies.description: AI quickly reacts to breaking news or sentiment shifts, capturing volatile price swings in real-time.

core.title: Data Analysis
core.description: AI systems analyze historical and real-time data to detect patterns and correlations, including price trends, market sentiment, economic indicators, and news.

core.title: Machine Learning Models
core.description: Machine learning models learn from historical data to predict future market movements. Types include supervised learning, unsupervised learning, and reinforcement learning.

core.title: Natural Language Processing (NLP)
core.description: NLP models analyze text-based data sources, such as news articles, social media posts, and financial reports, to gauge market sentiment and potential impact on asset prices.

core.title: Backtesting and Optimization
core.description: AI models are tested on historical data to assess effectiveness and fine-tuned for improved performance, allowing for robust and adaptable trading strategies.

core.title: Automated Execution
core.description: AI trading systems automatically execute buy and sell orders based on preset conditions or learned patterns, minimizing human intervention and reducing emotional decision-making.

advantages.title: Speed and Efficiency
advantages.description: AI trading systems can process vast amounts of information and execute trades in milliseconds, capitalizing on fleeting opportunities.

advantages.title: Data-Driven Decisions
advantages.description: AI can analyze multiple data sources simultaneously, making informed decisions based on a comprehensive view of market conditions.

advantages.title: Reduced Emotional Bias
advantages.description: By removing human emotions from trading, AI systems help maintain a consistent strategy, avoiding impulsive or fear-driven decisions.

advantages.title: 24/7 Trading
advantages.description: AI systems can operate continuously, which is especially valuable in markets like Forex and crypto that trade around the clock.
